solution: Subtract 3*R1 from R2 to get [[1,2],[0,-2]]. Then divide R2 by -2 to get [[1,0],[0,1]]. So RREF(A) = I.

text: Compute ∮_C (y dx + x dy) around the unit circle x^2 + y^2 = 1 oriented counterclockwise.
solution: Parametrize x = cos(t), y = sin(t), 0 ≤ t ≤ 2π. Then dx = -sin(t) dt, dy = cos(t) dt. Integrand: y dx + x dy = sin(t)(-sin(t) dt) + cos(t)(cos(t) dt) = -sin^2(t) dt + cos^2(t) dt = cos(2t) dt. ∮ = ∫_0^{2π} cos(2t) dt = [ (1/2) sin(2t) ]_0^{2π} = 0.
